publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1940.2 John Swinburne: A Better Deal for Pensionersâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-1940) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, insert at end "and restore the link, broken in 1982, between pensions and average national earnings." Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Dr Jean Turner*, Dennis Canavan*, Margo MacDonald*
